welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Caerfyrddin, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport is used for shipping and receiving freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haverfordwest Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
